alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 10:34AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow will diminish late Wednesday morning and early Wednesday afternoon. Light snow amounts up to an inch are expected through Wednesday afternoon. Additional snowfall is expected Wednesday evening through Thursday morning south of Highway 50. An additional 1 to 4 inches of snow is possible along and south of Highway 50 with the snow that moves into the area this evening through Thursday morning. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Kansas and central, north central, northeast, northwest and west central Missouri. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact Wednesday evening`s and Thursday morning`s commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
